text.p: Look at the result of the previous problem. Does this mean that [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are inverses of one another?

font.p: No. For [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] to be inverses, both [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]BA[/mathjaxinline] must be the identity.
